main_definition: An event or a particular time when something happens, typically of some importance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A special and significant event or happening that is worthy of attention or celebration.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her wedding anniversary was a very important occasion for their family.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An opportunity to do something, typically one-time and not likely to occur again.
meanings_and_examples.example: I saw an opening on the project timeline that could be considered as a good occasion to ask for help.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A moment of time when something happens or takes place.
meanings_and_examples.example: The concert was scheduled for 8 PM, so it would occur at the end of the evening on Saturday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An appropriate time to do or say something in a social context.
meanings_and_examples.example: He waited for the right occasion to give his friend an expensive gift as he wanted to show respect and thoughtfulness.
